summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 5 and 6, Crown Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue West and 8th Avenue West, from West Blaine Street to West Howe Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 110093 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
